title: Chocolate covered Easter eggs
ingredients: ['125g butter, softened', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 (200g) tub cream cheese, softened', '1kg icing sugar', '250g creamy peanut butter (optional)', '75g desiccated coconut (optional)', '85g cocoa powder (optional)', '325g plain chocolate pieces', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil (optional)']
